text: Need Quinn Richardson for Bed Bath N' Table campaign. Budget around $14,199, looking for 3 x Instagram reel, 3 x Twitter post, 3 x Twitter post, 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x 15-second TikTok. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
